thread.title: Saido Berahino is in line for England as Danny Ings injured
thread.title_full: Saido Berahino is in line for England as Danny Ings injured

title: Saido Berahino is in line for England as Danny Ings injured
text:
Tweet 
The Liverpool forward suffered a cruciate ligament injury in his first training session with new manager Jurgen Klopp after making his England debut against Lithuania on Monday night. 
The 23-year-old is out for the rest of the season and will be unavailable for Euro 2016 in France. 
Berahino is yet to win a cap for England, although the 22-year-old has featured in all the youth teams and appeared 13 times for the under-21s. 
England manager Roy Hodgson, who promoted Berahino into the first team at Albion, named the Burundi-born marksman in his squad for the Euro 2016 qualifier against Slovenia in November last year. 
Berahino did not come on in either that game or a friendly with Scotland soon after and has not been named in the squad since with Harry Kane storming his way into Hodgson’s thoughts last season. What do you think?
